metadata.title: Stanley 32040 Power Horse Grounded 8- Outlet Upright Power Center
features: 3 outlets spaced to accommodate larger plugs and transformer adapters
Standup design keeps outlets off the floor
Angled design allows for wrapping additional extension cord (sold separately)
Individual outlet covers with spring-loaded hinges
description: The STANLEY POWERHORSE is an 8-outlet, 2-sided upright power center. It features 5 outlets on 1 side and 3-transformer-spaced outlets on the other. All outlets are individually covered and grounded. The POWERHORSE has a rubberized comfort grip for easy portability and a tough, durable folding design. It's also easy to wrap an extra extension cord (sold separately) around its sides while the elevated design protects the outlets from dust and debris.

This Stanley 8-outlet two-sided upright power center features 5-outlets on one side and 3-transformer outlets on the other. All outlets are individually covered and grounded. It has a rubberized comfort grip. It has a tough and durable folding design, portable-fold and wrap and go. This elevated design protects from water, dust and debris.
